rules_text:
Whenever Keystone Predator or enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, create a 1/1 white Wolf creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on up to one creature.
Trophy {3}{W} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its trophy cost as an Aura enchantment spell with enchant Human. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
